briefTitle: KanSurvive: Testing a Model for Improving Cancer Survivorship Care in Rural Practice
officialTitle: KanSurvive: Testing a Model for Improving Cancer Survivorship Care in Rural Practice
conditions: Breast Cancer, Colorectal Cancer, Lung Cancer, Prostate Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percent change in evidence based cancer screening
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Must be a primary care practice caring for rural cancer survivors
* Must be willing to participate in four ECHO sessions
* Must be capable and willing to complete pre- and post- data collection
